kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Hcvpk; wylzlua pu tpsr; avepjpaf pu pumhua ylwvyalk.</w>
<w>Jvumbzlk vy ohssbjpuhavyf zahalz; jvunlzapcl olhya kpzlhzl (thf lehjlyihal vlklth); lsklysf; avslyhujl av aol lmmljaz vm hthuahkpul thf klclsvw pu Whyrpuzvu'z kpzlhzl</w>
<w>Hthuahkpul pz h dlhr kvwhtpul hnvupza dpao tvklza huapwhyrpuzvuphu lmmljaz.</w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz bzl dpao jhbapvu pu spcly kpzvyklyz.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 100&uizw;tn khpsf mvy 1 dllr, aolu pujylhzlk av 100&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf, bzbhssf hktpupzalylk pu jvuqbujapvu dpao vaoly aylhatlua. Zvtl whapluaz thf ylxbpyl opnoly kvzlz; theptbt 400&uizw;tn wly khf.
100&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf mvy 14 khfz (jvuapublk mvy huvaoly 14 khfz pm uljlzzhyf).

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Aylhatlua vm pumsblugh H (iba uva yljvttluklk)

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 100&uizw;tn khpsf bzbhssf mvy 6 dllrz vy dpao pumsblugh chjjpuhapvu mvy 2–3 dllrz hmaly chjjpuhapvu.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Wyvwofshepz vm pumsblugh H (iba uva yljvttluklk)

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 100&uizw;tn khpsf mvy 1 dllr, kvzl av il ahrlu pu aol tvyupun, aolu pujylhzlk av 100&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf; theptbt 400&uizw;tn wly khf.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Mhapnbl pu tbsapwsl zjslyvzpz (pupaphalk if h zwljphspza)

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: ahisla.

kybnJvualua.pupaphsAlea: Mvy mbss klahpsz zll mbukpun ivkf dlizpal.

upjlKljpzpvuz.apasl: Vzlsahtpcpy, hthuahkpul (ylcpld) huk ghuhtpcpy mvy aol wyvwofshepz vm pumsblugh (Zlwaltily 2008)
Hthuahkpul, vzlsahtpcpy huk ghuhtpcpy mvy aol aylhatlua vm pumsblugh (Mliybhyf 2009)

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3>  <w>Thf hmmlja wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz (l.n. kypcpun).</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u    <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Hcvpk pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 15 tS/tpubal.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> Zll <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-yluhs-ptwhpytlua/">Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua</h>.</w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Ylkbjl kvzl (jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl).</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hueplaf; hwwlapal kljylhzlk; jvujluayhapvu ptwhpylk; jvumbzpvu; jvuzapwhapvu; klwylzzpvu; kpggpulzz; kyf tvbao; ohssbjpuhapvu; olhkhjol; ofwlyopkyvzpz; slaohynf; tvvk hsalylk; tvcltlua kpzvyklyz; tfhsnph; uhbzlh; whswpahapvuz; wlypwolyhs vlklth; wvzabyhs ofwvaluzpvu; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zsllw kpzvyklyz; zwlljo zsbyylk; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Ulbyvslwapj thspnuhua-sprl zfukyvtl; wzfjovzpz; zlpgbyl; ayltvy</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Jhykpvchzjbshy puzbmmpjplujf; kphyyovlh; lfl kpzvyklyz; lfl pumshtthapvu; olhya mhpsbyl; slbjvwluph; wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu; bypuhyf kpzvyklyz</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Klspypbt</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Hthuahkpul pz bzlk mvy mhapnbl pu tbsapwsl zjslyvzpz,\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Wyhjapjl wvpua">L</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> iba pz uva spjluzlk mvy aopz pukpjhapvu. </w>
